bibl.title: Demotic Papyri from the Sacred Animal Necropolis at North Saqqara. Pleas, Oracle Questions and Documents referring to Mummies.
Acts of the Tenth International Congress of Demotic Studies. Leuven, 26-30 August 2008.

bibl.note: The papyri date approximately to the period 500-250 BC. - Introduction. - Part I. Letters or pleas to deities (including curses and a blessing): 1. P. Saqqara Inv. H5-DP 4 [1602]; - 2. Inv. H5-DP 195 + 256 + 276 [1793 + 1854 + 1874]; - 3. Inv. H5-DP 230 [1828]; - 4. Inv. H5-DP 282 [1880]; - 5. Inv. 71/2-DP 146 [5832]; - 6. Inv. H5-DP 52 [1650]; - 7. Inv. H5-DP 222 [1820]; - 8. Inv. H5-DP 413 [2334]. - Part II. Oracle questions: 9. Inv. H5-DP 43 [1641]; - 10. Inv. H5-DP 372 [2294]; - 11. Inv. 71/2-DP 20 [5706]; - 12. Inv. 71/2-DP 92 [5778]. - Part III. Documents referring to mummies: 13. Inv. 71/2-DP 67 [5753]; - 14. Inv. 71/2-DP 130 [5816]; - 15. Inv. 71/2-DP 135 [5821]; - 16. Inv. 72/3-DP 44 [6180]; - 17. Inv. H5-DP 469 [2390].
bibl.seg: Harry S. Smith & Sue Davies, Demotic Papyri from the Sacred Animal Necropolis at North Saqqara. Pleas, Oracle Questions and Documents referring to Mummies.

Mark Depauw & Yanne Broux (edd.), Acts of the Tenth International Congress of Demotic Studies. Leuven, 26-30 August 2008 = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 231 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, 2014) pp. 263-317, 17 pll.

The papyri date approximately to the period 500-250 BC. - Introduction. - Part I. Letters or pleas to deities (including curses and a blessing): 1. P. Saqqara Inv. H5-DP 4 [1602]; - 2. Inv. Documents referring to mummies: 13. Inv. 71/2-DP 67 [5753]; - 14. Inv. 71/2-DP 130 [5816]; - 15. Inv. 71/2-DP 135 [5821]; - 16. Inv. 72/3-DP 44 [6180]; - 17. Inv. H5-DP 469 [2390].
